Text:
Sir im looking for some books on [(ROV - REMOTELY OPERATED VEHICLES) ALL MATERIAL UNDERWATER RELATED] like these for my final year college project plz...can u help...any help would be appreciated.
BASICALLY ANYTHING (ROV)

This is the main book---
